newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss franc closes firmer despite dollar support.
newsitem.headline: Swiss franc closes firmer despite dollar support.

text.p: 1500 GMT - The Swiss franc closed firmer against the dollar and mark after a busy session driven by U.S. data that pushed the dollar up from earlier lows but still left it below Wednesday's close. * Dollar ends at 1.4368/4373 Swiss francs vs opening 1.4340/4350 and previous close of 1.4434/4440 * Mark finishes at 84.52/54 centimes vs opening 84.62/65 and prior close of 84.80/81 * Traders said dollar would test 1.4300 soon after going as low as 1.4230 Swiss francs before U.S. data.

* Dollar, after sliding overnight on stronger yen and mark, got a boost from U.S. consumer prices and industrial production for April that markets saw as favouring an interest rate hike. * Mark topped out at 84.70 centimes, support around 84.45 before an expected retest of upper bounds towards 84.85/95.
